revision.text:
{{Wireless embedded system |brand=MikroTik |model=Woobm |revision=-USB |upc= |ean=0708747434828 |asin=B078SMLSHL |price=16 |est_release_date=09/15/2017 |fcc_date=08/01/2017 |manuf_country=China |is_manuf=No |availability=now |type=access point, wireless USB hub, |fcc_id=TV7WBM |ic_id=7442A-WBM |pwr_v=5 |pwr_amp=0.5 |pwr_conn=USB (Type A) |cpu1_brand=Espressif |cpu1_model=ESP8266;ESP8266EX; |cpu1_cspeed=160 |fla1=4 |fla1_brand= |fla1_model= |ram1=16 |ram1_brand= |ram1_model= |expansion_if_types=USB 2.0 |expansion_usb_num=1 |jtag= |serial=yes,, wireless console,, |wi1_chip1_brand=Espressif |wi1_chip1_model=ESP8266;ESP8266EX; |wi1_802dot11_protocols=bgn |wi1_ant_conn= |wi1_txchains=1 |wi1_rxchains=1 |wi1_sstreams=1 |eth_none=true |addl_chips=USB 2.0 to Serial Bridge Controller;Prolific Technology;PL2303;;1; |flags= |stock_boot= |stock_os= |tp_firmware= |802dot11_protocols=bgn |default_ssid= |default_ssid_regex= |default_ip= |default_user= |default_pass= |oui= |oui_eth= }} {{TagLine|Wireless Out of Band Management USB Stick}} :[https://mikrotik.com/product/woobm Product page]
*[[MikroTik Woobm-USB]] :RouterBOARD: TikApp, Client/CPE, CCR
===Specifications=== *CPU: [[Espressif]] ESP8266 - 802.11bgn [[IoT]] WiSoC :Tensilica L106 32-bit RISC processor (@160MHz) :Interfaces: SDIO 1.1/2.0, SPI, UART ([https://www.espressif.com/en/products/hardware/esp8266ex/overview ESP8266EX]) :[https://nurdspace.nl/images/e/e0/ESP8266_Specifications_English.pdf Datasheet] [https://nurdspace.nl/ESP8266 more info] *Supported protocols: 802.11b/g/n *Antenna gain: 1.5dBi *USB port: USB 2.0 (Type A) *Power input: 5V *Dimensions: 55 x 19 x 8 mm
